mapper.select: SELECT TCC.*, TCC_LINK.tcc_id AS links_tcc_id, TCC_LINK.id AS links_id, TCC_LINK.uri AS links_uri, TCC_LINK.path AS links_path, TCC_LINK.expire AS links_expire, TCC_LINK.create AS links_create, TCC_LINK.update AS links_update, TCC_LINK.status AS links_status FROM t_tcc TCC LEFT JOIN t_tcc_link TCC_LINK ON TCC.id = TCC_LINK.tcc_id WHERE TCC.status = 0 -- AND -- NOW() >= TIMESTAMPADD(MINUTE, 1, TCC.create) ORDER BY create ASC LIMIT 100

SELECT TCC.*, TCC_LINK.tcc_id AS links_tcc_id, TCC_LINK.id AS links_id, TCC_LINK.uri AS links_uri, TCC_LINK.path AS links_path, TCC_LINK.expire AS links_expire, TCC_LINK.create AS links_create, TCC_LINK.update AS links_update, TCC_LINK.status AS links_status FROM t_tcc TCC LEFT JOIN t_tcc_link TCC_LINK ON TCC.id = TCC_LINK.tcc_id WHERE microservice = #{microservice} AND TCC.status = 0 -- AND -- NOW() >= TIMESTAMPADD(MINUTE, 1, TCC.create) ORDER BY create ASC LIMIT 100

SELECT TCC.*, TCC_LINK.tcc_id AS links_tcc_id, TCC_LINK.id AS links_id, TCC_LINK.uri AS links_uri, TCC_LINK.path AS links_path, TCC_LINK.expire AS links_expire, TCC_LINK.create AS links_create, TCC_LINK.update AS links_update, TCC_LINK.status AS links_status FROM t_tcc TCC LEFT JOIN t_tcc_link TCC_LINK ON TCC.id = TCC_LINK.tcc_id WHERE TCC_LINK.path = #{path} ORDER BY create DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE t_tcc SET status = #{tcc.status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = version + 1, update = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{tcc.id, javaType=java.util.UUID, typeHandler=com.forsrc.common.core.mybatis.handler.UUIDTypeHandler} AND version = #{tcc.version, jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE t_tcc SET microservice = #{microservice}, version = version + 1, update = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE status = 0 AND version = 0 AND microservice = '' LIMIT 100
